main_text:
Interaction with Other Notions
4. Interaction with Other Notions

In this section we focus on how grounding might be related to the
notions of necessity, essence, and fundamentality. There are
interesting issues concerning the relationship between grounding and
other phenomena that we don’t have the space to discuss here. In
addition to the examples listed at the beginning of this entry (e.g.,
real definition and truthmaking), one such issue concerns the relation
between grounding and degrees of reality. Indeed, K. McDaniel
(2017: Ch. 8) sketches an account of the former in terms of the
latter.
hierarchy_title: Metaphysical Grounding || Interaction with Other Notions
